name: Malboro's Eye
effects: Increase resistance to Poison, Sleep, Silence and Petrify by 50% for all allies for 3 turns

name: Malboro's Eye

desc_short: Boost resistance to poison, sleep, silence and petrify to all allies for 3 turns
3回合內提高全體隊員中毒睡眠沉默石化耐性的數值
아군 전체의 독, 수면, 침묵, 석화 저항력 3턴 동안 상승
Augmente la résistance à poi., som., sil., et pétri. de tous les alliés pendant 3 tours
Erhöht Resistenz gegen Gift, Schlaf, Stille und Stein für drei Runden, alle Verb.
Aumenta la res. al ven, sue, sil y pie de todos los aliados durante 3 turnos
